alert.note: Alert for Huron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:53AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Huron County through 900 AM EDT... At 753 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Port Austin to 6 miles east of Caseville to near Pigeon. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Port Austin around 800 AM EDT. Kinde around 805 AM EDT. Bad Axe around 820 AM EDT. Port Hope around 825 AM EDT. Harbor Beach around 830 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Pinnebog, Port Crescent State Park, Redman, Filion, Huron City, Helena, Rapson, Grindstone City, Verona and Bay Port. People attending Huron Community Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
